Class DAO

public class DAO extends Object

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DAO getInstance()
      Public method to access the singleton instance

    • checkForToken

      boolean checkForToken(String authToken)
      checks if given authToken is in the DAO
      Parameters:
      authToken - is the authToken to be checked against the DAO
      Returns:
      boolean type to signify if the authToken is in the DAO

    • insertGame

      public void insertGame(Game gameToAdd)
      inserts a new game into the DAO
      Parameters:
      gameToAdd - is the game being added

    • findGame

      public Game findGame(int gameID)
      finds a Game in the DAO given a gameID
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the ID of the game to find
      Returns:
      Game type is the Game that is found returns null if no match

    • findAllGames

      public HashSet<Game> findAllGames()
      returns all games in the DAO
      Returns:
      HashSet of Game type is a List of all games

    • ClaimSpot

      public void ClaimSpot(String username, int gameID, String playerColor) throws DataAccessException
      inserts a user into a gae
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player trying to join
      gameID - is the ID of the desired game
      playerColor - is the color that the user wants to play
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if there is already a user at the desired position

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(int gameID)
      removes a game from DAO
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the ID of game to delete

    • clearAllGames

      public void clearAllGames()
      clears all games from DAO

    • CreateUser

      void CreateUser(User user) throws DataAccessException
      registers new user
      Parameters:
      user - is the new User object to add
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the username (or email?) is already in the DAO

    • authenticateUser

      boolean authenticateUser(String username, String password)
      checks if username and password are a match
      Parameters:
      username - is the entered username
      password - is the entered password
      Returns:
      boolean type for if the user is authenticated or not
